bibl.title: Three Fragmentary Byzantine Documents from the Duke Collection.
bibl.note: 1. P. Duke Inv. 69. Order to supply oil to worker(s). Provenance unknown, fifth / sixth century. - 2. Inv. 500 (ex P. Miss. Inv. 66). Lease of Land. Antaeopolite, sixth century. - 3. Inv. 497 (ex P. Miss. Inv. 63). Letter of Victor, s√ämmaxow. Provenance unknown, seventh century. <summachos>
GONIS Nikolaos, Three Fragmentary Byzantine Documents from the Duke Collection.
